attributes.title: Awful and glitch
attributes.review: Made me feel like I was in a cage and couldn’t leave. Really reminded me of times where I haven’t had the freedoms to dictate my own health care options. And the graphics just kept glitching like when I look at images of SCOTUS and kavannaughs face sometimes looks all predatory. Do not recommend.

attributes.title: i’m appalled
attributes.review: this app is just like trump it’s slow takes up space and is just ugly. if i could give it a lower rating i would but it won’t let me. if you’re thinking of getting this DONT. it will take up all the space in your phone and doesn’t even give u info about his campaign.

attributes.title: DON'T DOWNLOAD!!!!!!
attributes.review: When I got this app  it asked for all of my information. So I gave it to them not thinking about what could happen. Next thing I know there are loud bangings on my door. I look out the window and see men in black suits. They held up their phone and showed a pic of me downloading the app. They grabbed me an burned my house. I barely escaped.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: I was walking my pet fish and left my phone at home. When I came back, this app was on my phone (probably installed by my sister) and I found that I HAD A VIRUS on my phone. 😡😡 All of my information was given to Chinas Government 🤬. We NEED to get rid of this app because if we don’t, China will get all our information!!!! 😠😤🤬

attributes.title: Worst app ever literally never redownloading anything like this ever again
attributes.review: This app was so bad. All I got was ads and it just kept spewing false information at me. It took hours to download and it took all of my data. It analyzed my personal data WITHOUT my permission and it crashed my phone every 6 minutes

attributes.title: orange death hampsters!
attributes.review: do not download this app! not only did this app take 42,069 years to download, but when it did giant orange hampsters started crawling out of my phone and trying to eat me! luckily my big booty protected me and i just sat on them and crushed them. but then weird things started happening outside of my house. a snake with a fake spray tan and toupé was waiting outside my door. i told him to go away but he wouldn’t leave. he said he was trying to sell me hats and fake tan. he then proceeded to break my window and come in my house and try to strangle me! i suggest not downloading this app.

attributes.title: Saddened and disappointed
attributes.review: I wanted to see what my fav president was up to and downloaded this app just to find out it’s Donald Trump. Where did Obama go? Did Trump kidnap him? I am not happy about this and will not be recommending this app to any of my friends and family so they don’t have to deal with the amount of stress I just went through.

attributes.title: Bruh moment
attributes.review: This app is a bruh moment if it were an app. I tried to download it but it wouldn’t let me. Once i was able to download it I started turning orange and old. I suddenly had the urge to say “ you’re fired!” Very strange things began to occur from that moment. I do not reccomend this app for no one because i feel as if- 𝒮𝒽𝒶𝓌𝓉𝒾𝑒𝓈 𝓁𝒾𝓀𝑒 𝒶 𝓂𝑒𝓁𝑜𝒹𝓎

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: This app took so so long to download, and once it finally did, it was so glitchy and i could not even get off of the log in screen. I later in the day went to buy something on the app store and i realized that IT HAD WIPED ALL THE MONEY FROM MY ACCOUNT.  This app is dangerous and needs to be taken down immediately

attributes.title: Super laggy and terrible structure
attributes.review: the app has a terrible structure and is so confusing to use. it takes days to download and within the first day of downloading it it wiped all my information from my phone. i didn’t let me do anything and wasn’t working at all . terrible service
